superAdmin.walkthroughCompleted: Tour completed! You're now ready to use this feature effectively.
superAdmin.generalHelpContent: Welcome to EventForge Help! Use this application to manage events, notifications, chat, and more. Each section has its own help system with detailed tutorials and walkthroughs.
superAdmin.selectMessage: Visit the specific sections (Notifications, Chat, SuperAdmin) and click 'Take a Tour' to start an interactive walkthrough of that feature.
superAdmin.centerMessage: Tutorial Center: Access step-by-step guides for each feature. You can reset your progress and replay tutorials at any time. Visit Notifications, Chat, or SuperAdmin sections and click 'Quick Start' to begin.
superAdmin.confirmUserStatusChange: Are you sure you want to {0} user '{1}'? This action will be logged in the audit trail.
superAdmin.confirmTenantStatusChange: Are you sure you want to {0} tenant '{1}'? This action will be logged in the audit trail and may affect all tenant users.
superAdmin.confirmImpersonation: Are you sure you want to impersonate user '{0}'? This action will be logged in the audit trail and will end the current session.
superAdmin.impersonationRequested: Impersonation of {0} requested. Feature in development.
superAdmin.accessDeniedSuperAdmin: Access denied. Super Administrator role required.
superAdmin.exportFunctionalityComingSoon: Export functionality will be implemented soon.
superAdmin.confirmEnable: Are you sure you want to enable tenant '{0}'?
superAdmin.confirmDisable: Are you sure you want to disable tenant '{0}'?
superAdmin.noTenantsMatchFilters: No tenants match the applied filters.
superAdmin.noUsersMatchFilters: No users match the applied filters.
superAdmin.noLogsFound: No logs found. Integrate with logging system to load data.
superAdmin.noAuditDataFound: No history available. Integrate with audit trail API.
superAdmin.superAdminRoleRequired: You don't have permission to access this page. Super Administrator role is required.
superAdmin.accessDeniedSuperAdmin: Access denied. Super Administrator role is required.
superAdmin.centralizedTranslationManagement: Centralized translation management for all supported languages
superAdmin.exportFunctionalityComingSoon: Export functionality will be implemented soon.
superAdmin.operatingAsAnotherUser: You are operating as another user. All actions will be logged.
superAdmin.impersonationWarning: ATTENTION: Impersonation is a critical functionality that should only be used for urgent technical support. All operations are logged in the audit trail.
superAdmin.switchHistoryDescription: Implement recovery of tenant switch and impersonation history.
superAdmin.switchHistoryFields: History should include: date and time, operation type (tenant switch, impersonation), target tenant/user, operation reason, operation duration, IP address and user agent.
superAdmin.noHistoryAvailable: No history available. Integrate with audit trail API.
superAdmin.recoverTenantList: Recover list of tenants manageable by SuperAdmin
superAdmin.performTenantSwitch: Perform context switch to selected tenant
superAdmin.implementImpersonationApi: TODO: Implement API for user impersonation with complete audit.
superAdmin.noAuditRecords: No audit records match the applied filters.
superAdmin.implementSwitchTenant: TODO: Implement switch to tenant: {0}. Reason: {1}
superAdmin.implementRestoreContext: TODO: Implement restore SuperAdmin original context
superAdmin.auditIntegrationDescription: Implement integration with audit trail system.
superAdmin.auditFeaturesNeeded: The following functionalities will need to be implemented: audit event retrieval from database with advanced filters, correlation between related events (sessions, transactions), detailed visualization of payload and context, full-text search in event details, custom export for compliance and reporting, retention policies and automatic archiving, real-time alerting for critical events, analytics dashboard for patterns and anomalies.
superAdmin.criticalOperationsDescription: Implement recovery of recent critical operations: tenant switches by SuperAdmin, user impersonations, critical permission changes, multiple failed login attempts, tenant management operations.
superAdmin.eventDetailsDescription: Implement detailed visualization of selected audit event with: complete operation payload, context data (session ID, correlation ID, user agent), before/after for modification operations, related events in the same session, IP geolocation (if available), timeline of related events.
superAdmin.implementAuditSearch: TODO: Audit search - Operation: {0}, User: {1}, Result: {2}
superAdmin.loggingIntegrationDescription: Integration with the logging system will be implemented in a future version.
superAdmin.loggingFeaturesDescription: The following functionalities will be available: connection to logging system (Serilog, NLog, etc.), optimized queries with pagination for large volumes, detailed visualization of stack trace and context, correlation between log entries (correlation ID, trace ID), syntax highlighting for JSON, XML in messages, export in various formats (CSV, JSON, TXT), automatic alerting for critical errors.
superAdmin.noLogsFound: No logs found. Integrate with logging system to load data.
superAdmin.chartsAvailableInFuture: Charts for trend visualization will be available in a future version: distribution by log level over time, error frequency by source, activity peaks and their correlations, performance metrics (response time, throughput).
superAdmin.logDetailsDescription: Detailed visualization will be implemented with the following functionalities: formatted complete stack trace, context data (user, tenant, correlation ID), request/response data if available, correlated log entries.
superAdmin.createFirstConfiguration: Start by creating the first configuration
superAdmin.confirmDeleteConfiguration: Are you sure you want to delete the configuration '{0}'?
superAdmin.noTranslationsFound: No translations found for current filters.
superAdmin.confirmTenantDelete: Are you sure you want to delete tenant '{0}'? This action cannot be undone and will delete all associated data.
superAdmin.confirmUserDelete: Are you sure you want to delete user '{0}'? This action cannot be undone.
superAdmin.confirmUserDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete user '{0}'? This action cannot be undone and will be logged in the audit trail.

admin.dashboardDescription: This is the admin dashboard. Here you can manage system settings, users, and other administrative tasks.

general.overview: Welcome to EventForge! This section provides helpful information about using this feature.
general.gettingStarted: Get started by exploring the available options and tools.
general.tips: Helpful tips and tricks for using this feature effectively.

notifications.center: View and manage all your notifications in one place
notifications.filter: Filter notifications by type, status, or date

chat.channels: Browse and join different chat channels
chat.files: Share files with your team members

superadmin.audit: View system audit trail and logs

files.upload: Upload files to share with your team

notifications.overview: The notification center helps you stay informed about important events and updates in EventForge. Here you can view, filter, and manage all your notifications efficiently.
notifications.filtering: Use the filter options to find specific notifications. You can filter by type (info, warning, error), status (read/unread), or date range.
notifications.actions: Select one or more notifications to perform bulk actions like marking as read or deleting. You can also click on individual notifications to view more details.
notifications.preferences: Customize which types of notifications you want to receive and how you want to be notified (email, in-app, etc.).

chat.overview: The chat system enables real-time communication with your team members. Join channels, send messages, and share files seamlessly.
chat.channels: Channels are organized conversations around specific topics or teams. Join relevant channels to stay connected with your colleagues.
chat.messaging: Send text messages, use formatting options, and mention other users with @username. Messages are delivered instantly to all channel members.
chat.files: Share documents, images, and other files directly in chat. Files are securely stored and accessible to channel members.

superadmin.overview: SuperAdmin tools provide comprehensive system administration capabilities. Manage users, configure settings, and monitor system health.
superadmin.users: Create, edit, and manage user accounts. Assign roles, set permissions, and monitor user activity across the system.
superadmin.configuration: Configure system-wide settings including security policies, feature toggles, and integration parameters.
superadmin.audit: Monitor all system activities through comprehensive audit logs. Track user actions, system changes, and security events.

files.overview: File management allows you to upload, organize, and share files securely within EventForge.
files.upload: Drag and drop files or click to browse. Supported formats include documents, images, and archives up to 50MB.
files.management: Organize files in folders, rename items, and manage permissions. Use search to quickly find specific files.
files.sharing: Control who can access your files. Set permissions for viewing, downloading, or editing shared content.

onboarding.dontShowAgainHelp: You can always access help from the menu

welcome.title: Welcome to Notifications
welcome.content: Learn how to manage your notifications effectively. This center displays all important updates and alerts from EventForge.

filters.title: Filter Your Notifications
filters.content: Use filters to organize your notifications by type, status, or date. This helps you focus on what's most important.

actions.title: Take Action
actions.content: Mark notifications as read, delete them, or respond directly. Bulk actions let you manage multiple notifications at once.

preferences.title: Set Your Preferences
preferences.content: Customize which notifications you receive and how you're alerted. Tailor the experience to your needs.

welcome.title: Welcome to Chat
welcome.content: Start communicating with your team in real-time. Chat channels help organize conversations by topic or project.

channels.title: Join Channels
channels.content: Browse available channels and join those relevant to your work. Each channel has its own conversation history.

messaging.title: Send Messages
messaging.content: Type your message and press Enter to send. Use @mentions to notify specific users and formatting for emphasis.

files.title: Share Files
files.content: Click the attachment icon to share files with your team. Files are stored securely and accessible to channel members.

welcome.title: SuperAdmin Overview
welcome.content: Access powerful administrative tools to manage the entire EventForge system. Monitor, configure, and maintain system health.

users.title: Manage Users
users.content: Create and manage user accounts, assign roles, and monitor user activity. Ensure proper access control across the system.

config.title: System Configuration
config.content: Configure system-wide settings, security policies, and feature toggles. Changes here affect all users.

audit.title: Audit Trail
audit.content: Monitor all system activities and changes. The audit trail provides complete visibility into system operations.

notification-header.title: Notification Center
notification-header.description: This is your notification center where all your notifications are displayed.
notification-header.action: Look at the notification header and title

notification-filters.title: Filter Options
notification-filters.description: Use these filters to organize your notifications by type, status, or date.
notification-filters.action: Try clicking on filter buttons to narrow down results

notification-list.title: Notification List
notification-list.description: Your notifications appear here. Click on any notification to view details.

notification-actions.title: Quick Actions
notification-actions.description: Use these buttons to mark notifications as read, delete, or take other actions.
notification-actions.action: Try clicking the 'Mark All as Read' button

chat-channels.title: Chat Channels
chat-channels.description: These are your available chat channels. Click to join a conversation.
chat-channels.action: Select a channel to view its messages

chat-messages.title: Message Area
chat-messages.description: Your conversation messages appear here in real-time.

chat-input.title: Message Input
chat-input.description: Type your message here and press Enter to send.

chat-files.title: File Sharing
chat-files.description: Click the attachment icon to share files with your team.

admin-navigation.title: Admin Navigation
admin-navigation.description: Use this navigation to access different administrative functions.

admin-dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview
admin-dashboard.description: Get a quick overview of system status and key metrics.

admin-users.title: User Management
admin-users.description: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions here.
admin-users.action: Click to view user management tools
